title: Night of the Living Dead iPod and Flash video versions

sources.title: Night of the Living Dead iPod and Flash video versions
sources.description: In this classic yet still creepy horror film, strangers hold up in a rural Pennsylvania farmhouse and battle constant attacks from dead locals who have been brought back to life by mysterious radiation. WARNING - This is a graphic horror film with some gory special effects. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page Flash Web Video FLV File (right-click to download)
